continue.post_instructions: You will now complete a short quiz to confirm your understanding of the task.

prompt.focus: Make sure the photodiode is aligned and the EEG recording has begun before continuing.
prompt.fullscreen: Press 'cmd + ctrl + F' to toggle Fullscreen.
prompt.zoom: Zoom in to enlarge the screen.
prompt.begin_recording:
To the Experimenter:

You may start the EEG recording now.
prompt.confirm_recording: Press any key to confirm the recording has begun.
prompt.relax_reminder:
Reminder:

Keep your face, head, and shoulders as relaxed as possible as muscle activity interferes with our signals. Thank you!

You may continue to the task.

welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

userid.set:
Please enter the Subject ID.
(The file will automatically be named Subject ID_Session_Effort.)
userid.sessionNum:
Please enter the Session # (Enter ONLY 1 or 2).
(The file will automatically be named Subject ID_Session_Effort.)
userid.set_prolific:
Please enter your Prolific ID into the box below:
Warning: You cannot leave this box empty!

eventMarker.found: Hold the USB event marker in front of the camera.
eventMarker.not_found: Note: no USB event marker found.

instructions.choose_btwn_two_balloons: In this experiment, you will be making a choice between inflating one of 2 balloons by pressing corresponding keys on the keyboard: Q and P
instructions.your_job: Your job is to pop the balloons by pumping them up to a spike in order to win points!
instructions.pop_balloon_earn_money: The points earned from popping a balloon will be shown with a '+' sign in front of it (i.e. +1).
instructions.points_to_bonus_conversion: For every 20 points that you win in the game, you will get $1 at the end of the experiment.
instructions.cumulative_rewards: You will be shown the total number of points earned at the end of each trial. *Insert picture here*
instructions.two_balloons:
There are 2 kinds of balloons:
GREEN and BLUE balloons.
instructions.blue_balloon_points: BLUE balloons will always pop after you pump 20 times and you may win 1 point.
instructions.green_balloon_points: GREEN balloons may win you more points, but will require more pumps.
instructions.green_balloon_pop_time: GREEN balloons will always pop after 25 seconds.
instructions.green_balloon_pump_bonus:
If you continue to pump the GREEN balloon after it hits the spike within the 25 seconds time limit, the bigger the balloon will get and the more bonus points you will earn.

If you pump the GREEN balloon and it does not reach the spike within the 25 seconds time limit, you will earn some of the points for pumping the balloon.

(Example: If the total possible points you can earn for a balloon is 2 points and you pump the balloon halfway to the spike, you will earn 1 point.)
instructions.green_balloon_variable_points_pumps: For the GREEN balloon, the number of pumps needed and the number of points you could win can change on each round. The number of pumps and points are listed below the GREEN balloon.
instructions.blue_balloon_constant_points_pumps:
For the BLUE balloon, the potential win will always stay the same (1 point),
and it will always require 20 pumps.
instructions.reward_prob_variable:
For some rounds, the chances that you will win points for either balloon are 50%
(even after popping the balloon).
instructions.reward_prob_certain: In other rounds the chances of winning will be 100%.
instructions.prob_display_location: The probability at which you will receive points for a trial will appear at the bottom of the screen.
instructions.reward_prob_display_event: The chances of winning points on that round, and the number of points possible to win, will be shown to you while you choose which balloon to inflate.
instructions.pump_keys:
Press the Q key to pump the balloon on the left.
Press the P key to pump the balloon on the right.
instructions.choice_locked_in: Once you have chosen a balloon, you can only pump that balloon.
instructions.ready:
The experiment will start now.
Press next when ready!
instructions.blue_practice_pump:
In the next trial, try popping the BLUE balloon:
To pump it, press the Q key with your left index finger to first choose the blue balloon and then to pump it. Wait for the balloon to appear on screen before beginning to pump.
instructions.green_practice_pump:
In the next trial, try popping the GREEN balloon:
To pump it, press the P key with your right index finger to first choose the green balloon and then to pump it. Wait for the balloon to appear on screen before beginning to pump.
instructions.wait_pump: <b>Wait for the balloon to appear on screen before beginning to pump.
instructions.missed_choice: You will have 6 seconds to make your decision. If you do not respond in time, you will lose the opportunity to win points on that round and will move on to a new round.

quiz.confirm_understanding: To make sure you understand the task instructions, we will ask you some questions about how to perform the task.
quiz.quiz_attempts: You will have 5 attempts at answering the quiz. Once you reach this limit, you will have to return the HIT.
quiz.review: Press any key to review the rules of the task.
quiz.retake: Press any key to retake the quiz.

prompt.more_pumps: 1. Which balloon requires more pumps? BLUE or GREEN?
prompt.reward_certainty_reach_spike: 2. True or False: You will <u>ALWAYS</u> get points once you reach the spike.
prompt.bonus_blue: 3. True or False: You can get bonus points on the BLUE balloon.
prompt.bonus_green: 4. True or False: You can get bonus points on the GREEN balloon.
prompt.total_shown: 5. True or False: You will be shown your total number of points after each round.
prompt.points_to_money: 6. True or False: You will receive real money from your total number of points at the end of the task.

rules.shown_probability: 1. You will be shown the probability of earning points for a round.
rules.shown_blue_green_on_screen: 2. You will be shown a BLUE balloon and a GREEN balloon on the screen.
rules.job: 3. Your job is to choose which balloon to pump up.
rules.blue_req_20: 4. The BLUE balloon will ALWAYS require 20 pumps to reach the spike and can give 1 point.
rules.green_vary_bonus: 5. The GREEN balloon will VARY in pumps required and can give bonus points.
rules.twenty_five_secs_green: 6. You have 25 seconds to pump the GREEN balloon in order to receive all points possible.
rules.bonus_green_spike: 7. You can get bonus points on the GREEN balloon for pumping it up past the spike.

countdown.post_break_resume: You will resume the task in
countdown.redirect_to_prolific:
The experiment has ended.

You will now be redirected to the Prolific website to be considered as having completed the study.

Please wait ...

break.prompt: You may now take a break. You have completed Block
break.done: Press any key to end your break and to resume the task.

questionnaires.intro:
Now that you have completed the computerized task, we will ask you to please complete several surveys.
Upon successfully completing the surveys, you will be brought back to Prolific.

payment.proceed: Please press the 'm' key to proceed.
